newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Plate Glass sees earnings growth return.
newsitem.headline: Plate Glass sees earnings growth return.

text.p: South African glass manufacturer Plate Glass & Shatterprufe Industries Ltd said on Thursday it expected a return to growth in earnings in the new financial year, barring any deterioration in domestic demand.

"With progressive resolution of manufacturing problems...and expectations of a further improvement from Belron, a return to growth in earnings is anticipated, barring any deterioration in domestic demand," group chairman Ronnie Lubner said in a statement.

Plate Glass earlier reported a six percent fall in earnings per share to 702 cents for the year ended March 31 from 745 cents before while the final dividend was unchanged at 184 cents, again making a total of 333 cents for the year.
